[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"信息图通过图形、图表、图标等视觉元素，把复杂信息转换为易读、易记的内容。一个完整的信息图通常包含以下核心要素。"}],"
",["$r","img",null,{"src":"https://mdn.alipayobjects.com/huamei_qa8qxu/afts/img/A*h5VoQreEoK4AAAAAXTAAAAgAemJ7AQ/original","alt":"composition"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"title","children":"标题（Title） "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"标题是核心主题的标识，用于第一时间传达内容与目的。它应该简洁、醒目，通常放在顶部或显著区域。"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"item","children":"数据项（Item） "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"数据项承载具体信息，是叙事的基本单元，多组数据项组合成完整内容。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"数据项通常包含以下子元素："}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"item-label","children":"标签（Item Label） "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"标签是数据项的标识文字，说明类别、名称或维度。保持简短精炼，便于快速识别。"}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"item-desc","children":"描述（Item Desc） "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"描述补充背景或细节，常包含数值、百分比、趋势说明，帮助读者理解意义与重要性。"}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"item-icon","children":"图标（Item Icon） "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"图标是数据项的视觉符号，用图形化方式提升识别度。合适的图标能快速传达类型或特征，降低认知负担。"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"decoration","children":"装饰元素（Decoration） "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"装饰元素用于优化视觉层次、引导视线或营造氛围，如背景纹理、分隔线、几何色块等。适度使用，避免喧宾夺主。"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"illustration","children":"插图（Illustration） "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"插图是较大面积的视觉图像，可辅助说明主题或提供隐喻。手绘、扁平或写实风格皆可，关键是与文字和数据形成互补，使抽象信息更具象。"}]]}]]

[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"Infographics transform complex information into readable and memorable content through visual elements such as graphics, charts, and icons. A complete infographic typically includes the following core elements."}],"
",["$r","img",null,{"src":"https://mdn.alipayobjects.com/huamei_qa8qxu/afts/img/A*h5VoQreEoK4AAAAAXTAAAAgAemJ7AQ/original","alt":"composition"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"title","children":"Title "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"The title is the identifier of the core theme, used to convey content and purpose at first glance. It should be concise and eye-catching, typically placed at the top or in a prominent area."}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"item","children":"Data Item (Item) "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Data items carry specific information and are the basic units of narrative. Multiple data items combine to form complete content."}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Data items typically include the following sub-elements:"}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"item-label","children":"Item Label "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"The label is the identifying text of a data item, explaining the category, name, or dimension. Keep it brief and concise for quick recognition."}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"item-desc","children":"Item Description (Item Desc) "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"The description supplements background or details, often containing values, percentages, or trend explanations, helping readers understand meaning and importance."}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"item-icon","children":"Item Icon "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"The icon is the visual symbol of a data item, enhancing recognition through graphical representation. Appropriate icons can quickly convey type or characteristics, reducing cognitive load."}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"decoration","children":"Decoration "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Decorative elements are used to optimize visual hierarchy, guide vision, or create atmosphere, such as background textures, dividing lines, and geometric color blocks. Use them moderately to avoid overshadowing the main content."}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"illustration","children":"Illustration "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Illustrations are larger visual images that can assist in explaining themes or providing metaphors. Hand-drawn, flat, or realistic styles are all acceptable. The key is to complement text and data, making abstract information more concrete."}]]}]]
